Patients 18 y/o fulfil DSM-IV criterion major depression , baseline HAM-D score ≧ 14 HAM-D item 3 score ＜ 3 recruited group . The study group patient receive ten week treatment combination fix-dosed sertraline aripiprazole . The control group receive sertraline . The score reduction HAM-D17 , CGI , SF-36 Brief Symptom Rating Scale ( BSRS-50 ) periodically estimate efficacy follow use SSRIs aripiprazole .
